content: ditch a boring hand towel and keep those hands happy with this crochet hand towel pattern this lovely hand towel was designed to have both large sections of drying space as well as strips of puff stitches for a gentle massage the stitch work creates both visual and touchable interest using a soft cotton yarn ensures this crochet hand towel feels great to use from the start and brings in the treat yourself feeling this hand towel pattern works up in row with the exception of the border which is worked in one round the puff stitches are separated by chain spaces to maximize drying ability ★skill level advanced beginner crocheters looking to follow this pattern should know how to *read a crochet pattern - there is not a video tutorial for this crochet hand towel pattern *work the basic stitches - chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet *how to work in row *work puff link this or be willing to learn *work in the 3rd loop only or be willing to learn *create chain 1 spaces and work into them *place a border or be willing to learn this is not a beginner pattern absolute beginners will find this pattern outside of their skill level however the step by step photo tutorials through the pattern as well as for all special stitches and techniques will guide you through ★ pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorials for all special stitches special techniques and step by step through each row of the pattern as well as step by step through the border with linked resources this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with no photo tutorial to help save ink for crocheters who prefer to print their patterns ★terms used us standard - pattern is written in english ★size one size but easy to customize to your preferred size finished crochet hand towel using this pdf pattern is approximately 12 inches wide by 16 inches long ★materials required medium 4 weight 100% cotton yarn you will need approximately 4 oz / 112g / 213 yds yarn used we crochet s dishie in colorways sunbaked orange kenai blue and linen cream this yarn is 100% cotton 190 yds / 100 g per skein ★tools 4 mm g-6 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope you enjoy treating yourself with the radiant hand towel happy crocheting the loophole fox
